meanings.definition: Remove rough edges or burrs from (a metal object)
meanings.sent1: He deburrs the metal to make it smooth.
meanings.sent2: She always deburrs the edges of the metal pieces before assembling them.
meanings.sent3: The robot deburrs the metal with precision, like a skilled craftsman.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail when she deburrs is like an artist sculpting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the tool deburring the metal echoed in the workshop.

meanings.definition: The act of removing burrs from a metal object.
meanings.sent1: His deburrs are always thorough and efficient.
meanings.sent2: The deburrs on the metal pieces were done neatly.
meanings.sent3: The pile of deburrs on the workbench looked like tiny metal shavings.
meanings.sent4: She collected the deburrs in a jar as a quirky keepsake.
meanings.sent5: The deburrs scattered on the floor sparkled in the sunlight.
